resources.string: Connect with your most identical personalities.
First! Create your profile and select everything that describes you best.
Next! Answer some interesting questions to determine your personality type.
Finally! Connect to people who\'ve got the most similar personality as yours.
Stay in touch with the people you\'ve connected to in the past.

Cnectus is an idea to connect like minded people. It aims to bring together people who share similar personalities through its intensive match algorithm. Our vision is to have a society where it is easier for people to connect with people they can share a healthy bond with and thus promoting better friendships and relationships.
